sentences.en: Broadcast news was accurate and reliable but deadly dull.
sentences.cn: 新闻广播准确可靠但却非常枯燥。

sentences.en: CNN’s live broadcast of the trial (=  sent out at the same time as the events are happening  )
sentences.cn: 美国有线电视新闻网对这场庭审的现场直播

sentences.en: Has the machinery been put up ready for the broadcast?
sentences.cn: 广播器材安装完毕了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He has made a name for himself by his broadcast talks.
sentences.cn: 他的广播谈话使他出了名.

sentences.en: Local radio stations serving coastal areas often broadcast forecasts for yachtsmen.
sentences.cn: 服务沿海地区的地方广播电台经常为驾驶游艇出海的人播报天气预报。

sentences.en: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles.
sentences.cn: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。

sentences.en: Old movies were the cheapest broadcast fodder.
sentences.cn: 老电影是最廉价的播放素材。

sentences.en: Recapped the headlines at the end of the news broadcast.
sentences.cn: 在新闻的最后把主要内容概述一下.

sentences.en: The broadcast media sniffily affects to distance itself from the press.
sentences.cn: 广播媒体态度轻蔑地故作姿态，要跟新闻媒体保持距离。

sentences.en: The coronation broadcast marked the arrival of television.
sentences.cn: 加冕典礼的转播标志着电视时代的到来。

sentences.en: The election broadcast consisted largely of talking heads.
sentences.cn: 有关选举的电视广播主要播放发言者的特写镜头。

sentences.en: The exorcism was broadcast on television.
sentences.cn: 电视上播放了驱邪仪式。

sentences.en: The interview was broadcast live across Europe.
sentences.cn: 这次采访向整个欧洲进行了现场直播。

sentences.en: The interview was broadcast on radio and television.
sentences.cn: 广播和电视都报道了这次会见。

sentences.en: The planetarium staff also prepared talks for radio broadcast.
sentences.cn: 天文馆的工作人员还要准备讲稿给电台广播.
这个节目曾在全国播放过。
